channel.title: tomcat – Rashid Azar's Weblog
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: Lets Start Java
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: From last few days I was struggling with Eclipse and Tomcat. I was not able to execute servlet from Eclipse IDE. After doing a lot of research finally I got the solution. All I need to do is to copy a folder “tomcat/webapps/ROOT” to “workspace/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.wst.server.core/tmp0/wtpwebapps” (or …/tmp1/wtwebapps if you already configured another server). Source: http://www.coreservlets.com/Apache-Tomcat-Tutorial/tomcat-7-with-eclipse.html
